title: [NDS]Working Chrono Trigger [JAP-ENG] DSTT
description:
First of all this was tested with the DSTT(or TTDS whichever you like) flashcard on the 1.16 firmware.

1.Drag the Chrono Trigger.nds into on of your folder whichever you like.
2.Overwrite the current USERCHEAT.DAt file with this one
3.Turn on the DS go onto the Chrono rom and go to the cheat options.
4.Turn on the (No m3)Anti Piracy cheat and you can play the game now

FTommy
